column4: All I can do is either, install it "side by side" which gives me two ubuntu's, or do a complete reinstall, wiping out vista.
or there was an advanced option, but I have no idea how to do that
could someone confirm that deleting my ubuntu partition is a good idea? I'm pretty sure nothing will go wrong but I just want to hear someone that actually knows what they're talking about say it.
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
